body: @IRyuji I can understand that, as the vibe throughout this whole story just feels "off" to me. Which in all likeliness stems from miscommunication about what each person in this "relationship" wants.
Page 58, hey I wanna die like that one too.

This get's really annoying ahead to the ones that don't like NTR, I started reading this on a normal site(not one for hentai) expecting a lovely story between friends but then it gets really bad ahead, just a heads up and in my opinion, it's not just the NTR.
Another Diamond Being found and Translated by the Scanlords
